entry.string: The caching configuration file is not writable by the web server. #(1) must be writable by the web server for the output caching to be managed by xarCacheManager.
entry.translation: Zee cecheeng cunffeegooreshun feele-a is nut vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! #(1) moost be-a vreeteble-a by zee veb serfer fur zee ooootpoot cecheeng tu be-a muneged by xerCecheMuneger.

entry.string: Please add the following line to your config.caching.php file :n#(1)
entry.translation: Pleese-a edd zee fullooeeng leene-a tu yuoor config.caching.php feele-a :n#(1)
